page.title: 10GOWY VALLEY FARMING
page.content: Area 3,000 acres. Made up of Grassland 1550,Meadow 200,Woodland 10,Corn 725, Potatoes 65,Horticultral 75(fruit) and Housing & roads 375. The 22 farm units employ 50 men,who use 58 tractors & attendant machinery on the land. { LIVESTOCK}grazing: Milking cattle 851 (mainly Fresian),Beef calves 200,Dairy replacement calves 600,Bullocks 350, Sheep 200,Horses 15 (Carriage business & Pleasure), Pigs (housed) 300.Cattle for milk production are Fresian, Beef are mainly Hereford, remainder are Hereford/ Fresian. Working farms are Meadow Lea, The Byatts,Home Farm,Birch Bank, Stamford Hollow, Milton Brook Lodge, Barrow Hall and Holme Street Hall. The only horticultural farm is Belle Vue Fruit Farm.
